Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey in section, the interior is ribbed, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393950) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393950)
